Based on your preferences and those cues, here are some potential recommendations: 
- Title: The Odyssey  | Plot: The film consists of 24 continuous shorts by  n groups of filmmakers telling the complete story of THE ODYSSEY, Homer' s epic in 24 chapters. The story begins at the end of a war, the invasion of Troy by the Greeks, and chronicles the 10- year journey home of one warrior, Odysseus. Having offended Poseidon, the God of the Sea, Odysseus is thwarted at every turn in his voyage, and even passes through the realm of the dead before reaching Ithaka, his kingdom. The epic hints at what it might mean to travel to wage war, to then try to return to the point of departure, and to have both left behind and carried home chaos.

On her way to London for further education, Mala happens to encounter a young man named Louie Evans, who is also on his way to London for further education. Being both from wealthy families, having already achieved higher degrees of education through various means, and being on their respective journeys to London for further education, the two young men, Mala and Louie Evans, have an instant attraction towards each other, which culminates in a passionate affair between the two young men, Mala and Louie Evans.
